data.title: Child-resistant Packaging (CRP)
data.excerpt: State law requires that all cannabis goods are sold in child-resistant packaging (CRP). CRP is packaging that is designed to be hard for children under five years of age to open. It is the responsibility of the licensee that packaged the cannabis good to make sure that the package meets CRP requirements.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
